description:
HD Wallpapers All Optimized for the latest iOS 7, iPhone 5S, iPhone 5C & iPod Touch 5 (640 x 1136), iPad Air, iPad Mini, iPad 3rd Gen and all other iOS devices. 

Bright up your device screen with cool radiant glowing backgrounds! Don’t wait when you can have over 10,000 pictures to choose from

Get awesome cool radiant glowing backgrounds now to bright up your iOS device. Get it now and make your world luminous

----There are tons of pictures to choose from-----

We want you to enjoy our award winning quality wallpapers in Apps store

You will be blown away with the quality & quantity of collection we have in our gallery

-------------- Awesome Features ------------------

√ Best Handpicked Collection of latest Glowing Wallpapers 

√ Super fast loading & less memory consumption.

√ Fast and easy navigation within App using swipe, pinch and zoom.

√ Friendly search key to your favorite choice.

√ Categorized Organization of Wallpapers.

√ Unlimited downloads every day.

√ 24/7 update so that you don’t get bored.

√ Pixel level detail of Cool User Interface making your time inside the App a soothing one.

√ Slide to enlarge image anytime

-----------------------------------------

What our fans has to say:

Great Backgrounds!  ***
by Robert lee
I have bet there is no other cool app as this app in app store. It’s amazing! Try it for yrself.

awesome       ****
by Mony K
I downloaded many wallpapers. This is probably the top best. Keeping it for a long time. This application speaks for itself. 

We are doing everything to understand your need and trying to innovate with the best possible ideas. 

----------------------------------------

Disclaimer

All the contents are collected from different sources those doesn’t violate copyright law and the purpose of this application is fully non-commercial.

Special Note

Your Rating & Feedback make us wake up & inspire for new creation every day. Please post your valuable opinions in terms of Ratings & Reviews. Don’t forget to like & get social with us on FB & follow us on Twitter for updates & special promotions.
